meta.content: profecia, christ, jesus, truth, covid19, profecias, ciencias, guerra, war, israel, biden, trump, 911, plagas, Dios, God
meta.name: keywords

b:includable.b:comment: Clear out style (needs to be a non-empty string)
We don't display labels on the home page.
We call super.postShareButtons from the migrated positions.
Overridden, and migrated to postFooter. Called as postFooterJumpLink.
Ripple, and show 'keep reading' as the default.
Cap the total number of ads (widgets and inline ads).

b:with.b:comment: Filter out the featured post, but only on the homepage.

b:with.value: data:view.isHomepage ? data:posts filter (post => post.id not in data:featuredPostIds) : data:posts

b:includable.b:comment: Don't show feed links.
Don't show
Don't show

a.class: btn btn-light btn-block text-primary mb-3 rounded-0

b:include.data: { buttonClass: "pill-button", limit: 1, items: data:this.data, itemSet: "data", itemsMarkup: "super.hierarchy" }
b:include.name: extendableItems

b:includable.b:comment: Re-order the thumbnail before the snippet, add 'Keep reading' link.

b:include.data: { image: data:post.featuredImage, imageSizes: [256, 512, 945, 1684], imageRatio: "945:600", sourceSizes: "(min-width: 954px) 842px, (min-width: 801px) calc(100vw - 112px), calc(100vw - 64px)", enhancedSourceset: data:highRes }
b:include.name: responsiveImage

b:includable.b:comment: If we are replacing the title, force it to render anyway, and it'll be hidden in CSS.
Default the title to 'Popular posts from this blog'.
Add a 'keep reading' link to the item-content.

div.b:comment: No title for single profiles. Default to 'Blog authors' for team.

b:includable.b:comment: Change link to 'visit profile'

textarea.onblur: if (this.value == "") {this.value = "Report an issue or send feedback..";}
textarea.onfocus: if (this.value == "Report an issue or send feedback..") {this.value = "";}
textarea.placeholder: Report an issue or send feedback..
textarea.value: Report an issue or send feedback..
